display_long_description:
# Trickshots – The Ultimate VR Golf-Bat Challenge!  
Trickshots is a **physics-driven VR golf-bat game** where skill, creativity, and a little chaos collide!  
🚀 Launch giant soccer balls into giant red cups inside **massive environments** and **uncover secret codes** as you unlock new courses and bats.  
🏌️‍♂️ With **10 courses, 90 holes**, and **14 unique mini-games**, there's always a **new challenge** waiting.  

⚠️ **Fair warning… this game is VERY hard!**  

---


---


[media]  
# 💯 100% Free! 
✅ **All updates and content will be free—forever!**  
🤬 **No refunds for the frustration you'll feel trying to beat each course.**  



---

[media]  
# 🎮 14 Mini-Games – Unique Challenges in Every Game!  
Each of the **14 mini-games** in Trickshots brings a **fresh challenge**—can you **master them all**?  
Test your **skills**, adapt to **wild mechanics**, and **outsmart tricky physics** in every game!  


---

[media]  
# ⛳ 10 Full Courses, 90 Trickshot Holes!  
Trickshots isn’t just about mini-games—there are **10 full courses** with **90 insanely difficult holes** of **Trickshots Golf!**  
Every hole is a **new puzzle**, pushing your **precision, creativity, and patience** to the limit!  




---


[media]  
# 🎸 Unlockable Bats – Earn Your Style!  
Crack a shot with style! 🔥 Beat a course and unlock a **secret code** to claim a **new custom bat!**  
There are **10 unlockable bats**, each with a **unique feel and special sound effects**.  
Use them in **any mini-game or Trickshots Golf hole!**
